[console_scripts]
stinger = stingeripc.tools.cli:run
stinger-ipc = stingeripc.tools.cli:run

[stinger_symbols]
cpp = stingeripc.lang_symb:CppSymbolsProvider
pb = stingeripc.symbols.protobuf:ProtocolBufferSymbolsProvider
python = stingeripc.lang_symb:PythonSymbolsProvider
rust = stingeripc.lang_symb:RustSymbolsProvider
